name: My Little Frankenstein
description:
My Little Frankenstein is a turn base combat monster raising game. Fight your way through other hideous creations, and merge them into yourself to become the ulltimate frankenstein monster.

a little explaination due to the lack of one in game (spoilers):

monsters are seperated into 3 types: eyes, hands and legs. most attacks are type attacks. the matchups are as follows:

  • hands beat eyes
  • eyes beat legs
  • legs beat hands

speed determines which one goes first. Some attacks can influence this.

accuracy determines how likely you are to miss or land a crit. Some attacks have a accuracy multiplayer. 

When merging with an enemy, your stats are averaged out with it.

the game is a submition the the 2023 brackeys jam. The game is playable, but we plan on polishing it a bit more after the jam deadline.
